content: Credit Card Miles Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Aug 2019Best Miles card for frequent purchase of SQ air tix?Due to my business nature, I have to frequently book SQ air tix for my clients, guests as well as entourage members. Sometimes 1 purchase can be as much as S$20k per buying.Which credit card will be most ideal as I understand various cards have limitation (eg. cap on monthly spend) for miles?1 answerAnswerBump0

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 11 Aug 2019I was about to list out a list then I remember this article.https://milelion.com/credit-cards/guide/
Scroll to the air tickets section and you will see what is recommended.Hope it helps!1 comment0
